title: President Donald J. Trump Signs S. 2779 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
August 8, 2018
On Wednesday, August 8, 2018, the President signed into law:S. 2779, the “Zimbabwe Democracy and Economic Recovery Amendment Act of 2018,” which amends the Zimbabwe Democracy and Economic Recovery Act of 2001.
